action.title: Demo Limitation
action.description: This action is disabled in the demo version. It works fully on the live platform.

popup.title: Demo Version
popup.description: This website is a demonstration of the platform's core features. Some functionalities such as payments, authentication, and dynamic state changes are intentionally disabled or simplified.

login.title: Demo Login
login.description: Since this site is a demonstration, you can enter any email or Commercial Registration Number with any password combination to log in.
